Articles.Content:
I noticed that there seems to be a small Space Shuttle boom going on down here, so I thought I'd post some albums of my own workhorse space shuttle as well and join the fun.

An earlier iteration didn't really garner much interest over on Reddit, but these always received some compliments on IRC so maybe you guys here on the forums might be interested as well.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Javascript is disabled. View full album

I can't provide craft files since this involves the Modular Rocket Systems and GN Drive mods, but maybe this together with the wonderful shuttles being posted around here will inspire you to try your own shuttle designs and share your adventures?
Word of advice: If you're gonna post pictures of your craft launching, be sure to launch it during the day so that we can actually see it.

I noticed that there seems to be a small Space Shuttle boom going on down here, so I thought I'd post some albums of my own workhorse space shuttle as well and join the fun.

An earlier iteration didn't really garner much interest over on Reddit, but these always received some compliments on IRC so maybe you guys here on the forums might be interested as well.

http://imgur.com/a/thYLN

http://imgur.com/a/PZyWc

I can't provide craft files since this involves the Modular Rocket Systems and GN Drive mods, but maybe this together with the wonderful shuttles being posted around here will inspire you to try your own shuttle designs and share your adventures?

Just post the links to the mods and than people can download you craft.

Just post the links to the mods and than people can download you craft.

Thing is I've modified the latter mod slightly to my taste, so there'd be incompatibilities or some other small problems that I don't want to bother the mod dev nor myself with. Such is the way things go with sharing adventures of modded stuff, hope you understand.
